optional-label: Complete all fields unless marked as optional.

terms-conditions-section.title: Terms and conditions of use and privacy statement
terms-conditions-section.instructions: Read the terms and conditions of use and privacy statement.
terms-conditions-section.acknowledge-terms: I read the Terms and Conditions
terms-conditions-section.acknowledge-privacy: I read the Privacy Notice Statement
terms-conditions-section.share-data: I consent to the sharing of data
terms-conditions-section.add-button: Agree to the terms and conditions of use and privacy statement

tax-filing-section.title: Tax filing
tax-filing-section.instructions: Your tax information is used to confirm that you are eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
tax-filing-section.have-filed-taxes: Myself and my spouse or common-law partner (if applicable) have received our Notice of Assessments from our income tax return.

tax-filing.form-instructions: Have you received your Notice of Assessment for your {{taxYear}} Canadian income tax return? If you have a spouse or common-law partner, have they received theirs too?

error-message.tax-filing-required: Select whether or not you have filed your taxes

file-your-taxes.ineligible-to-apply: You are not eligible to apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan at this time.
file-your-taxes.tax-not-filed: You, and if applicable your spouse or common-law partner, have not received your Notice of Assessment for {{taxYear}} from the Canada Revenue Agency.
file-your-taxes.unable-to-assess: We use your tax information to confirm that you meet the income and residency requirements for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
file-your-taxes.tax-info: For more information on how to file your taxes, visit <taxInfo>Get ready to do your taxes</taxInfo>.
file-your-taxes.apply-after: You can apply for the plan after you or your spouse or common-law partner have filed your taxes and received your Notice of Assessment.

type-of-application.type-application-description: Tell us who you are applying for. Are you applying for yourself, your child(ren) or on behalf of someone else?
type-of-application.type-application-children: I am applying for my child(ren)
type-of-application.type-application-family: I am applying for myself and my child(ren)
type-of-application.personal-info-description: Enter your Member ID, name, date of birth and Social Insurance Number (SIN).
type-of-application.new-or-returning-description: Select whether or not you have a Member ID.
